title: Detox Power Stack // Kleanse V2 & Gut Pro+
author: K-POW Nutrition
description: Introducing the Detox Power Stack! This stack includes one bottle of Kleanse, an all-natural daily detoxification and organ health supplement, and one bottle of Super Combo, a comprehensive probiotic and digestive enzyme supplement. This stack will leave you feeling like a superhero from the inside out!
cleaned_text: includes: Each and every day, your body is placed under an immense amount of stress. The least you could do is look after your internal organs by supplying them with tools that can help them function optimally. This stack places a big emphasis on gut health by combing Kleanse V2 and Gut Pro+. Kleanse V2 contains several ingredients that help lower inflammation, combat oxidative stress, eliminate toxins, and support overall gut health. Whereas, Gut Pro+ provides your gut with probiotics and digestive enzymes to enhance your microbiome. In other words, Kleanse helps get rid of the bad stuff, whereas Gut Pro+ feeds your body, especially the gut, with the good stuff! |WARNING: Consult with a physician prior to use if you have a medical condition. Don't use if pregnant or lactating. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. KEEP CONTAINER TIGHTLY CLOSED IN A COOL, DRY AND DARK PLACE.| |These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
